div.h2:
Maureen Joy Charter School exists to develop
the whole child through high-quality instruction,
school-community partnerships, and the promotion
of a positive self-identity.

div.class:
sqs-gallery-container sqs-gallery-block-grid sqs-gallery-aspect-ratio-square sqs-gallery-thumbnails-per-row-4
sqs-gallery-block-show-meta
block-animation-none clear
image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: We are looking for excellent teachers to join our family for 2019-2020. Visit our CAREERS page to learn more!

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: ¿Habla español? Ofrecemos nuestros recursos en espanol para su conveniencia.

div.h2: A Message to Our Immigrant Families and Community

div.data-block-json: {"blockAnimation":"none","layout":"caption-hidden","overlay":false,"description":{"html":"On March 13, 2017, The Maureen Joy Charter School Board of Directors adopted a Resolution in \"Support of Immigrant Students and Families\"."},"hSize":null,"floatDir":null,"html":"<iframe src=\"//www.youtube.com/embed/1DrAnTFAeRw?wmode=opaque&enablejsapi=1\" height=\"480\" width=\"854\" scrolling=\"no\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\">\n</iframe>","url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1DrAnTFAeRw","width":854,"height":480,"providerName":"YouTube","thumbnailUrl":"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/1DrAnTFAeRw/hqdefault.jpg","resolvedBy":"youtube"}

div.p: Por favor, haga clic aquí para ver nuestra resolución en español

Every child finds joy in developing their academic potential
and thriving as a leader in the community.

Reflection & Refinement
High Expectations
Consistency
Teamwork & Collaboration
Equity & Access
A Culture of Joy!
